00014 Date.getMonthNumberFromName = function (name) {
00015     var n = Date.CultureInfo.monthNames, m = Date.CultureInfo.abbreviatedMonthNames, s = name.toLowerCase();
00016     for (var i = 0; i < n.length; i++) {
00017         if (n[i].toLowerCase() == s || m[i].toLowerCase() == s) { 
00018             return i; 
00019         }
00020     }
00021     return -1;
00022 };

00029 Date.getDayNumberFromName = function (name) {
00030     var n = Date.CultureInfo.dayNames, m = Date.CultureInfo.abbreviatedDayNames, o = Date.CultureInfo.shortestDayNames, s = name.toLowerCase();
00031     for (var i = 0; i < n.length; i++) { 
00032         if (n[i].toLowerCase() == s || m[i].toLowerCase() == s) { 
00033             return i; 
00034         }
00035     }
00036     return -1;

00044 Date.isLeapYear = function (year) { 
00045     return (((year % 4 === 0) && (year % 100 !== 0)) || (year % 400 === 0)); 
00046 };

00054 Date.getDaysInMonth = function (year, month) {
00055     return [31, (Date.isLeapYear(year) ? 29 : 28), 31, 30, 31, 30, 31, 31, 30, 31, 30, 31][month];
00056 };

00058 Date.getTimezoneOffset = function (s, dst) {
00059     return (dst || false) ? Date.CultureInfo.abbreviatedTimeZoneDST[s.toUpperCase()] :
00060         Date.CultureInfo.abbreviatedTimeZoneStandard[s.toUpperCase()];
00061 };
00062 
00063 Date.getTimezoneAbbreviation = function (offset, dst) {
00064     var n = (dst || false) ? Date.CultureInfo.abbreviatedTimeZoneDST : Date.CultureInfo.abbreviatedTimeZoneStandard, p;
00065     for (p in n) { 
00066         if (n[p] === offset) { 
00067             return p; 
00068         }
00069     }
00070     return null;
00071 };

00086 Date.prototype.compareTo = function (date) {
00087     if (isNaN(this)) { 
00088         throw new Error(this); 
00089     }
00090     if (date instanceof Date && !isNaN(date)) {
00091         return (this > date) ? 1 : (this < date) ? -1 : 0;
00092     } else { 
00093         throw new TypeError(date); 
00094     }
00095 };

00102 Date.prototype.equals = function (date) { 
00103     return (this.compareTo(date) === 0); 
00104 };

00112 Date.prototype.between = function (start, end) {
00113     var t = this.getTime();
00114     return t >= start.getTime() && t <= end.getTime();
00115 };

00122 Date.prototype.addMilliseconds = function (value) {
00123     this.setMilliseconds(this.getMilliseconds() + value);
00124     return this;

00132 Date.prototype.addSeconds = function (value) { 
00133     return this.addMilliseconds(value * 1000);

00141 Date.prototype.addMinutes = function (value) { 
00142     return this.addMilliseconds(value * 60000); /* 60*1000 */
00143 };

00150 Date.prototype.addHours = function (value) { 
00151     return this.addMilliseconds(value * 3600000); /* 60*60*1000 */
00152 };

00159 Date.prototype.addDays = function (value) { 
00160     return this.addMilliseconds(value * 86400000); /* 60*60*24*1000 */
00161 };
00162 
00168 Date.prototype.addWeeks = function (value) { 
00169     return this.addMilliseconds(value * 604800000); /* 60*60*24*7*1000 */
00170 };

00177 Date.prototype.addMonths = function (value) {
00178     var n = this.getDate();
00179     this.setDate(1);
00180     this.setMonth(this.getMonth() + value);
00181     this.setDate(Math.min(n, this.getDaysInMonth()));
00182     return this;
00183 };

00190 Date.prototype.addYears = function (value) {
00191     return this.addMonths(value * 12);
00192 };

00205 Date.prototype.add = function (config) {
00206     if (typeof config == "number") {
00207         this._orient = config;
00208         return this;    
00209     }
00210     var x = config;
00211     if (x.millisecond || x.milliseconds) { 
00212         this.addMilliseconds(x.millisecond || x.milliseconds); 
00213     }
00214     if (x.second || x.seconds) { 
00215         this.addSeconds(x.second || x.seconds); 
00216     }
00217     if (x.minute || x.minutes) { 
00218         this.addMinutes(x.minute || x.minutes); 
00219     }
00220     if (x.hour || x.hours) { 
00221         this.addHours(x.hour || x.hours); 
00222     }
00223     if (x.month || x.months) { 
00224         this.addMonths(x.month || x.months); 
00225     }
00226     if (x.year || x.years) { 
00227         this.addYears(x.year || x.years); 
00228     }
00229     if (x.day || x.days) {
00230         this.addDays(x.day || x.days); 
00231     }
00232     return this;
00233 };

00236 Date._validate = function (value, min, max, name) {
00237     if (typeof value != "number") {
00238         throw new TypeError(value + " is not a Number."); 
00239     } else if (value < min || value > max) {
00240         throw new RangeError(value + " is not a valid value for " + name + "."); 
00241     }
00242     return true;
00243 };

00250 Date.validateMillisecond = function (n) {
00251     return Date._validate(n, 0, 999, "milliseconds");
00252 };

00259 Date.validateSecond = function (n) {
00260     return Date._validate(n, 0, 59, "seconds");
00261 };

00268 Date.validateMinute = function (n) {
00269     return Date._validate(n, 0, 59, "minutes");
00270 };
00271 
00277 Date.validateHour = function (n) {
00278     return Date._validate(n, 0, 23, "hours");
00279 };

00286 Date.validateDay = function (n, year, month) {
00287     return Date._validate(n, 1, Date.getDaysInMonth(year, month), "days");
00288 };
00289 
00295 Date.validateMonth = function (n) {
00296     return Date._validate(n, 0, 11, "months");
00297 };
00298 
00304 Date.validateYear = function (n) {
00305     return Date._validate(n, 1, 9999, "seconds");
00306 };

00320 Date.prototype.set = function (config) {
00321     var x = config;
00322 
00323     if (!x.millisecond && x.millisecond !== 0) { 
00324         x.millisecond = -1; 
00325     }
00326     if (!x.second && x.second !== 0) { 
00327         x.second = -1; 
00328     }
00329     if (!x.minute && x.minute !== 0) { 
00330         x.minute = -1; 
00331     }
00332     if (!x.hour && x.hour !== 0) { 
00333         x.hour = -1; 
00334     }
00335     if (!x.day && x.day !== 0) { 
00336         x.day = -1; 
00337     }
00338     if (!x.month && x.month !== 0) { 
00339         x.month = -1; 
00340     }
00341     if (!x.year && x.year !== 0) { 
00342         x.year = -1; 
00343     }
00344 
00345     if (x.millisecond != -1 && Date.validateMillisecond(x.millisecond)) {
00346         this.addMilliseconds(x.millisecond - this.getMilliseconds()); 
00347     }
00348     if (x.second != -1 && Date.validateSecond(x.second)) {
00349         this.addSeconds(x.second - this.getSeconds()); 
00350     }
00351     if (x.minute != -1 && Date.validateMinute(x.minute)) {
00352         this.addMinutes(x.minute - this.getMinutes()); 
00353     }
00354     if (x.hour != -1 && Date.validateHour(x.hour)) {
00355         this.addHours(x.hour - this.getHours()); 
00356     }
00357     if (x.month !== -1 && Date.validateMonth(x.month)) {
00358         this.addMonths(x.month - this.getMonth()); 
00359     }
00360     if (x.year != -1 && Date.validateYear(x.year)) {
00361         this.addYears(x.year - this.getFullYear()); 
00362     }
00363     
00364         /* day has to go last because you can't validate the day without first knowing the month */
00365     if (x.day != -1 && Date.validateDay(x.day, this.getFullYear(), this.getMonth())) {
00366         this.addDays(x.day - this.getDate()); 
00367     }
00368     if (x.timezone) { 
00369         this.setTimezone(x.timezone); 
00370     }
00371     if (x.timezoneOffset) { 
00372         this.setTimezoneOffset(x.timezoneOffset); 
00373     }
00374     
00375     return this;   
00376 };

00385     this.setSeconds(0);
00386     this.setMilliseconds(0);

00437 Date.prototype.moveToDayOfWeek = function (day, orient) {
00438     var diff = (day - this.getDay() + 7 * (orient || +1)) % 7;
00439     return this.addDays((diff === 0) ? diff += 7 * (orient || +1) : diff);
00440 };
00441 
00448 Date.prototype.moveToMonth = function (month, orient) {
00449     var diff = (month - this.getMonth() + 12 * (orient || +1)) % 12;
00450     return this.addMonths((diff === 0) ? diff += 12 * (orient || +1) : diff);
00451 };

00457 Date.prototype.getDayOfYear = function () {
00458     return Math.floor((this - new Date(this.getFullYear(), 0, 1)) / 86400000);
00459 };

00466 Date.prototype.getWeekOfYear = function (firstDayOfWeek) {
00467     var y = this.getFullYear(), m = this.getMonth(), d = this.getDate();
00468     
00469     var dow = firstDayOfWeek || Date.CultureInfo.firstDayOfWeek;
00470         
00471     var offset = 7 + 1 - new Date(y, 0, 1).getDay();
00472     if (offset == 8) {
00473         offset = 1;
00474     }
00475     var daynum = ((Date.UTC(y, m, d, 0, 0, 0) - Date.UTC(y, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0)) / 86400000) + 1;
00476     var w = Math.floor((daynum - offset + 7) / 7);
00477     if (w === dow) {
00478         y--;
00479         var prevOffset = 7 + 1 - new Date(y, 0, 1).getDay();
00480         if (prevOffset == 2 || prevOffset == 8) { 
00481             w = 53; 
00482         } else { 
00483             w = 52; 
00484         }
00485     }
00486     return w;
00487 };

00494     console.log('isDST');
00495     /* TODO: not sure if this is portable ... get from Date.CultureInfo? */
00496     return this.toString().match(/(E|C|M|P)(S|D)T/)[2] == "D";

00503 Date.prototype.getTimezone = function () {
00504     return Date.getTimezoneAbbreviation(this.getUTCOffset, this.isDST());
00505 };

00507 Date.prototype.setTimezoneOffset = function (s) {
00508     var here = this.getTimezoneOffset(), there = Number(s) * -6 / 10;
00509     this.addMinutes(there - here); 
00510     return this;
00511 };

00513 Date.prototype.setTimezone = function (s) { 
00514     return this.setTimezoneOffset(Date.getTimezoneOffset(s)); 
00515 };

00521 Date.prototype.getUTCOffset = function () {
00522     var n = this.getTimezoneOffset() * -10 / 6, r;
00523     if (n < 0) { 
00524         r = (n - 10000).toString(); 
00525         return r[0] + r.substr(2); 
00526     } else { 
00527         r = (n + 10000).toString();  
00528         return "+" + r.substr(1); 
00529     }
00530 };

00553 Date.prototype._toString = Date.prototype.toString;
00554 
00594 Date.prototype.toString = function (format) {
00595     var self = this;
00596 
00597     var p = function p(s) {
00598         return (s.toString().length == 1) ? "0" + s : s;
00599     };
00600 
00601     return format ? format.replace(/dd?d?d?|MM?M?M?|yy?y?y?|hh?|HH?|mm?|ss?|tt?|zz?z?/g, 
00602     function (format) {
00603         switch (format) {
00604         case "hh":
00605             return p(self.getHours() < 13 ? self.getHours() : (self.getHours() - 12));
00606         case "h":
00607             return self.getHours() < 13 ? self.getHours() : (self.getHours() - 12);
00608         case "HH":
00609             return p(self.getHours());
00610         case "H":
00611             return self.getHours();
00612         case "mm":
00613             return p(self.getMinutes());
00614         case "m":
00615             return self.getMinutes();
00616         case "ss":
00617             return p(self.getSeconds());
00618         case "s":
00619             return self.getSeconds();
00620         case "yyyy":
00621             return self.getFullYear();
00622         case "yy":
00623             return self.getFullYear().toString().substring(2, 4);
00624         case "dddd":
00625             return self.getDayName();
00626         case "ddd":
00627             return self.getDayName(true);
00628         case "dd":
00629             return p(self.getDate());
00630         case "d":
00631             return self.getDate().toString();
00632         case "MMMM":
00633             return self.getMonthName();
00634         case "MMM":
00635             return self.getMonthName(true);
00636         case "MM":
00637             return p((self.getMonth() + 1));
00638         case "M":
00639             return self.getMonth() + 1;
00640         case "t":
00641             return self.getHours() < 12 ? Date.CultureInfo.amDesignator.substring(0, 1) : Date.CultureInfo.pmDesignator.substring(0, 1);
00642         case "tt":
00643             return self.getHours() < 12 ? Date.CultureInfo.amDesignator : Date.CultureInfo.pmDesignator;
00644         case "zzz":
00645         case "zz":
00646         case "z":
00647             return "";
00648         }
00649     }
00650     ) : this._toString();
00651 };
